process.name: Utility - Barcode Generator
process.narrative: Generate 1 dimensional and 2 dimensional barcodes using the barcodes4.me API

stage.name: Stage1
stage.code:
Public Function GetDataTable(ByVal ColumnNamesCSV As String, ByVal ColumnTypesCSV As String) As DataTable
Dim objTable As DataTable Dim objColumn As DataColumn Dim aColumnNames As String() = ColumnNamesCSV.Split(",") Dim aColumnTypes As String() = ColumnTypesCSV.Split(",")
Try objTable = New DataTable For i As Integer = 0 To aColumnNames.Length - 1 objColumn = New DataColumn objColumn.DataType = System.Type.GetType(aColumnTypes(i).Trim) If objColumn.DataType = GetType(DateTime) Then objColumn.DateTimeMode = DataSetDateTime.Utc End If objColumn.ColumnName = aColumnNames(i).Trim objTable.Columns.Add(objColumn) Next
Catch e As Exception objTable = nothing End Try
Return objTable
End Function

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: File Exists
stage.narrative: Determines whether the specified file exsts. The full path must be specified.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: Download File
stage.narrative: Downloads a file from a web URL and saves it in a folder on disk.

input.name: Source URL
input.narrative: The URL of the file that is to be downloaded

input.name: Destination Path
input.narrative: The location of the folder where the file is to be saved

stage.name: Download File
stage.code: Using wc As New System.Net.WebClient() wc.DownloadFile(Url, Path) End Using

input.name: QR Code Value
input.narrative: The text that should be encoded within the QR code

input.name: Download Directory
input.narrative: The directory in which the barcode should be stored

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file (no extension is required)

input.name: Overwrite Existing Files
input.narrative: Optional: If the file exists should it be overwritten (Default = False)

input.name: Format
input.narrative: Optional: File Format of the png, jpg, gif (default = jpg)

input.name: Size
input.narrative: Optional: Size of 1-10 (Default = 5)

input.name: Error Correction Capability
input.narrative: Optional: 0-3 (sets the level of error correction capability of the QR code)

output.name: Filepath
output.narrative: The filepath to which the barcode was saved

condition.narrative: The existence of the file of interest will have been determined.

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: Overwrite File?
input.narrative: Should the file be overwritten if it exists

input.name: Directory
input.narrative: The directory in which the file is located

stage.name: File Exists1
stage.code: Try Exists = File.Exists(File_Name) Catch Exists = False End Try

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file to check

input.name: Overwrite File?
input.narrative: Should the file be overwritten if it exists

exception.detail: "The requested barcode format is invalid. Options are gif, png or jpg"
"The requested size is invalid for this type of barcode, select between 1 and 10"
"The requested ECC value is invalid. Select between 0 and 3"
"The length of your QR code value is not valid"

input.name: Barcode Value
input.narrative: The text that should be encoded within the barcode

input.name: Download Directory
input.narrative: The directory in which the barcode should be stored

input.name: File Name
input.narrative: The name of the file (no extension is required)

input.name: Overwrite Existing Files
input.narrative: Optional: If the file exists should it be overwritten (Default = False)

input.name: Format
input.narrative: Optional: File Format of the png, jpg, gif (default = jpg)

input.name: Width
input.narrative: Optional: The width of the barcode in pixels, if not specified then autosizing will be applied

input.name: Height
input.narrative: Optional: The height of the barcode in pixels,, if not specified then autosizing will be applied

input.name: Add Text
input.narrative: Optional: Should the valud of the barcode be displayed? (Default = True)

input.name: Type
input.narrative: Optional: They type of barcode that is required (Default = c128b) - Options are c39, c128a, c128b, c128c, i2of5

input.name: Source URL
input.narrative: The URL of the file that is to be downloaded

input.name: Destination Path
input.narrative: The location of the folder where the file is to be saved

stage.name: Generate URL
stage.narrative: - Add Base URL - Add Type - Add Filename

exception.detail: "The requested barcode format is invalid. Options are gif, png or jpg"
"The requested width or height is invalid for this type of barcode"
"The requested barcode type is invalid. Options are c39, c128a, c128b, c128c, i2of5"
"The requested type of barcode does not support the requested value"

output.name: Filepath
output.narrative: The filepath to which the barcode was saved

stage.name: Create Directory
stage.code:
Try If Not Directory.Exists(Directory_Path) Then Directory.CreateDirectory(Directory_Path) Else If ErrorIfAlreadyExists Then Throw New ApplicationException("Directory already exists") End If
Success = True Catch Ex as Exception Success = False Error_Message = Ex.ToString() End Try
